_sText:
Well, this is generally not fit for online. Its best for lan battles against a friend or relative. You will find 2 maps inside the archive. There will be the vs_hideout and the vs_hideout_4.

The difference is that vs_hideout_4 can have up to 4 players and no hdr while vs_hideout can have only 2 players and has hdr with built cubemaps. 

Hopefully you and your freind(s) will have a bit of fun with this map as it is small. 

All maps feature an light environment and vegetation.
